name: IntelligIS
tagline: The Power of Advanced IT Support Made Simple
description:
IntelligIS has helped businesses in the metro Atlanta area solve their technology challenges by offering advanced technical support with Data Center and Cloud solutions, Unified Communications, Managed IT Security and Managed IT Services.
We implement solutions from industry-leading technology companies to ensure our clients benefit from best-in-class solutions that will help them boost productivity, and achieve greater efficiencies while reducing their total cost of ownership.
